title: Extensive HPLC tandem mass spectrometry characterization of soluble degradation products of biodegradable nanoplastics under environmentally relevant temperature and irradiation conditions

Polyester based plastics, and in particular biodegradable ones, are increasingly used because they may be a partial solution to environmental pollution issues. Therefore, proper identification of their degradation products is...
